name: Fly on the Wall
description:
A cooperative puzzle game for two players. One player is the Scientist, the other player is the Fly. Entering different teleporters at the same time will combine DNA and give special abilities. The objective is to enter the same teleporter together to restore your DNA and warp to the next level.

[Controls]

Use the arrow keys to control the Scientist:

  • Left/Right: Move Left/Right
  • Up: Jump
  • Down: Drop down from ledge

Use the mouse to control the Fly:

  • Mouse over a stationary Fly to begin flying
  • Left Mouse (Click or Hold): Pick up objects

[Credits]

Robert Denner (Apostrophe) - Artwork, Level Design
Jamey Stevenson (dreamlogician) - Programming, Level Design
